definition.name: NXregistration
definition.doc: Draft extension of NXobject to include fields to describe image registration procedures.

field.name: new_centre
field.doc: Coordinates of the new centre point.

field.name: scaling
field.doc: Scaling factor to compensate shrinking from distortion correction.

group.name: TRANSFORMATION
group.doc: To describe the operations of image registration (combinations of rigid translations and rotations)

group.name: COLLECTION
group.doc: Class to describe freely the procedures employed.
